data.text:
✅ A fourth Covid-19 vaccine is being made available to the groups listed below in the coming months:
Everyone aged 75 and over
Residents in care home for older adults
Immunosuppressed people aged 12 and over

Find out more below:
https://t.co/bvD8rPqdEw

📆 Friday 4 March 10am-4pm Yate Shopping Centre, West Walk BS37 4AP
📆 Friday 4 March 3pm-6pm: Billings Pharmacy, 5A Kingchase Shopping Centre, Kingswood, BS15 8LP
📆Saturday 5 March9am-5pm: Lockleaze Sports Centre, Lockleaze, Bristol BS7 9XF
@sgloscouncil Vaccine only lasts 4 months so what happens then

📆 Wednesday 2 March 3pm-6pm: Billings Pharmacy, Kingswood, BS15 8LP
📆 Wednesday 2 March 10am-4pm Asda Longwell Green
📆 Thursday 3 March 10am-6pm (closed 1pm-2pm): Billings Pharmacy, Kingswood, BS15 8LP
📆 Thursday 3 March 10am-4pm Yate Shopping Centre, West Walk BS37 4AP

There are still opportunities to get your vaccine at a range of locations across the region from amazing NHS staff administering the vaccine.

✅ These clinics will be offering Pfizer Vaccine 1st and 2nd doses as well as the booster vaccine for 16+.
